title: VD every thirty seconds
brief_description: Every thirty seconds someone is infected with a venereal disease. it is more prevalent in the 15-25 year old group. Points out the ways in which one contracts these diseases and various treatments with emphasis on the importance of prompt medical attention in suspected cases.
